mail_body:
Dear [Employee Name],

We're thrilled to be assisting you with your relocation to [City name]!  We're excited to get started and make this transition as smooth as possible for you.

To help us understand your needs better and begin the process, we've scheduled a brief phone consultation to discuss your preferences and answer any questions you may have.  This will allow us to tailor our services to perfectly match your requirements.

The consultation is scheduled for [Date] at [Time] with [Agent Name]. Please let us know if this time works for you, or if you'd prefer an alternative time. We look forward to speaking with you soon!

Sincerely,
The [Relocation Company Name] Team
